definition: exam candidate/student whose name has been put forward for an exam
to check/to verify/to test/to examine/to take an exam/to take an entrance exam for/deceased father
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

sentences.english: What happens if a candidate loses their Test Report Form?
sentences.chinese: 如果考生的成績單丟失怎麼辦？

sentences.english: Candidates can be available during both shifts day and night.
sentences.chinese: 考生可同時可在白天和黑夜的變化。

sentences.english: Sixty percent of the examinee were very satisfied.
sentences.chinese: 百分之六十的考生都非常的滿意。

sentences.english: Candidates can attend the test with he admission ticket issued by the testing site.
sentences.chinese: 考生持主考單位核發的“准考證”進入考場參加考試。

sentences.english: What should the candidate bring for the Speaking test?
sentences.chinese: 在口試中考生應該帶什麼？

sentences.english: Hm, thank you. Now, please fill in this form.
sentences.chinese: 完成交費的考生，請填寫好報名表，填好後提交。

sentences.english: In addition, IELTS is generally not suitable for people under 16 years of age.
sentences.chinese: 另外，雅思考試一般不適合16歲以下的考生。

sentences.english: And, the share of the Asian test-takers who are women is fast approaching 50%.
sentences.chinese: 而且來自亞洲的考生中，女性比例正在迅速接近半數。

sentences.english: The candidates will received their Test Report Forms with one month after they finished their test.
sentences.chinese: 考生將在考試結束後一個月內收到成績單。

sentences.english: What level of English must a candidate have insgroupsto apply for IELTS?
sentences.chinese: 申請雅思考試的考生必須具備什麼樣的英語水平？

sentences.english: He is the orientation of the distribution of candidates, is scheduled to return to the only graduate of the unit.
sentences.chinese: 他是定向分配的考生，畢業只能回到預定的單位。

sentences.english: Internet chat rooms are packed with frustrated CFA candidates.
sentences.chinese: CFA考生在互聯網聊天室裏怨聲載道。

sentences.english: There is a little reduction of individual biases toward certain examinees after rater training.
sentences.chinese: 培訓後評分員對個別考生的偏頗性沒有明顯減少。

sentences.english: No. Candidates may use only their question book for calculations and scratch work.
sentences.chinese: 不行，考生只能使用他們的考卷來做爲草稿紙計算。

sentences.english: The 3rd, the second-round exam is the assessment of pair of examinee knowledge faces.
sentences.chinese: 第三，複試是對考生知識面的考覈。

sentences.english: Objective To analyze the factors which influence College Enterance Examinees filling the aspiration forms.
sentences.chinese: 目的對影響高考考生填報決策的因素進行探析。

definition: an examiner/an official conducting an exam
the exam area/the district where an exam takes place
to enter oneself for an examination

college entrance exam (especially as abbr. for 普通高等學校招生全國統一考試|普通高等学校招生全国统一考试[Pu3 tong1 Gao1 deng3 Xue2 xiao4 Zhao1 sheng1 Quan2 guo2 Tong3 yi1 Kao3 shi4])/(Tw) entrance exam for senior government service posts (abbr. for 公務人員高等考試|公务人员高等考试)
